00028    /* 
00029    * Constructor
00030    */
00031    CfbReptationMove::CfbReptationMove(McSystem& system) : 
00032       CfbEndBase(system),
00033       speciesId_(-1),
00034       bondTypeId_(-1),
00035       nJunction_(0),
00036       maskPolicy_(MaskBonded),
00037       hasAutoCorr_(0),
00038       autoCorrCapacity_(0)
00039    {} 
00040    
00041    /* 
00042    * Read parameters speciesId, nRegrow, and nTrial
00043    * also read hasAutoCorr, which may be either 0 or 1
00044    * if 1, also read autoCorrCapacity and autoCorrName
00045    */
00046    void CfbReptationMove::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00047    {
00048       // Read parameters
00049       readProbability(in);
00050       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00051       read<int>(in, "nTrial", nTrial_);
00052 
00053       // Check that 0 < nTrial_ <= MaxTrial
00054       if (nTrial_ <=0 || nTrial_ > MaxTrial_) {
00055          UTIL_THROW("Invalid value input for nTrial");
00056       }
00057 
00058       // Check that the Species is a subclass of Linear 
00059       Linear* speciesPtr;
00060       speciesPtr = dynamic_cast<Linear*>(&(simulation().species(speciesId_)));
00061       if (!speciesPtr) {
00062          UTIL_THROW("Attempted use ReptationMove with Species that is not Linear");
00063       }
00064 
00065       // Identify bond type 
00066       bondTypeId_ = speciesPtr->speciesBond(0).typeId();
00067 
00068       // Check that bond type is the same for all bonds
00069       int nBond = speciesPtr->nBond();
00070       for (int i = 1; i < nBond; ++i) {
00071          if (bondTypeId_ != speciesPtr->speciesBond(i).typeId()) {
00072             UTIL_THROW("Unequal bond type ids");
00073          }
00074       }
00075 
00076       // Identify policy for masking nonbonded interactions.
00077       maskPolicy_ = simulation().maskedPairPolicy();
00078  
00079       // Allocate memory for junction arrays
00080       int nAtom = speciesPtr->nAtom();
00081       junctions_.allocate(nAtom-1);
00082       lTypes_.allocate(nAtom-1);
00083       uTypes_.allocate(nAtom-1);
00084 
00085       // Identify junctions between atoms of different types
00086       int lType, uType;
00087       nJunction_ = 0;
00088       for (int i = 0; i < nAtom - 1; ++i) {
00089          lType = speciesPtr->atomTypeId(i); 
00090          uType = speciesPtr->atomTypeId(i+1); 
00091          if (lType != uType) {
00092             junctions_[nJunction_] = i;
00093             lTypes_[nJunction_] = lType;
00094             uTypes_[nJunction_] = uType;
00095             //std::cout << nJunction_ << "  " << i << "  " 
00096                      // << lType << "  " << uType << std::endl;
00097             ++nJunction_;
00098          }
00099       }
00100 
00101       read<int>(in, "hasAutoCorr", hasAutoCorr_);
00102  
00103       // read autocorrelation parameters 
00104       if (hasAutoCorr_) {
00105          read<int>(in, "autoCorrCapacity", autoCorrCapacity_);
00106          read<std::string>(in, "autoCorrName", outputFileName_);
00107 
00108          // Allocate memory for autocorrelation function of reptation steps
00109          int moleculeCapacity = simulation().species(speciesId_).capacity();
00110          acceptedStepsAccumulators_.allocate(moleculeCapacity); 
00111          for (int i = 0; i < moleculeCapacity; i++)
00112          {
00113             acceptedStepsAccumulators_[i].setParam(autoCorrCapacity_);
00114          }
00115       }
00116    }
00117 
00118    /* 
00119    * Generate, attempt and accept or reject a Monte Carlo move.
00120    */
00121    bool CfbReptationMove::move() 
00122    {
00123       Vector    oldPos, newPos;
00124       double    rosen_r,  rosen_f, ratio;
00125       double    energy_r, energy_f;
00126       Atom     *tailPtr; // pointer to the tail atom (to be removed)
00127       Atom     *atomPtr; // resetable atom pointer
00128       Molecule *molPtr;  // pointer to randomly chosen molecule
00129       int       length, sign, headId, tailId, oldType, i;
00130       bool      accept;
00131      
00132       incrementNAttempt();
00133 
00134       // Choose a molecule at random
00135       molPtr = &(system().randomMolecule(speciesId_));
00136       length = molPtr->nAtom();
00137 
00138       // Choose which chain end to regrow
00139       if (random().uniform(0.0, 1.0) > 0.5) {
00140          sign = +1;
00141          headId = length - 1;
00142          tailId = 0;
00143       } else {
00144          sign = -1;
00145          headId = 0;
00146          tailId = length - 1;
00147       }
00148 
00149       // Store current position and type of tail atom
00150       tailPtr = &(molPtr->atom(tailId));
00151       oldPos  = tailPtr->position();
00152       oldType = tailPtr->typeId();
00153    
00154       // Delete tail atom
00155       atomPtr = tailPtr + sign;
00156       deleteEndAtom(tailPtr, atomPtr, bondTypeId_, rosen_r, energy_r);
00157       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00158       // Delete from McSystem cell list
00159       system().pairPotential().deleteAtom(*tailPtr);
00160       #endif
00161    
00162       // Regrow head, using tailPtr to store properties of the new head.
00163       atomPtr = &(molPtr->atom(headId));
00164       tailPtr->setTypeId(atomPtr->typeId());
00165       tailPtr->mask().clear();
00166       if (maskPolicy_ == MaskBonded) {
00167          tailPtr->mask().append(*atomPtr);
00168       }
00169       addEndAtom(tailPtr, atomPtr, bondTypeId_, rosen_f, energy_f);
00170 
00171       // Calculate junction factor for heteropolymers.
00172       double jFactor = 1.0;
00173       if (nJunction_ > 0) {
00174          jFactor = junctionFactor(molPtr, sign);
00175          // Upon return, type ids are restored to original values.
00176       }
00177 
00178       // Decide whether to accept or reject
00179       ratio  = jFactor * rosen_f / rosen_r;
00180       accept = random().metropolis(ratio);
00181 
00182       // Restore original type and connectivity mask for tail Atom
00183       tailPtr->setTypeId(oldType);
00184       tailPtr->mask().clear();
00185       if (maskPolicy_ == MaskBonded) {
00186          atomPtr = tailPtr + sign;
00187          tailPtr->mask().append(*atomPtr);
00188       }
00189 
00190       if (accept) {
00191 
00192          // Store new head position
00193          newPos = tailPtr->position();
00194   
00195          // Shift position of tail 
00196          atomPtr = tailPtr + sign;
00197          tailPtr->position() = atomPtr->position();
00198 
00199          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00200          // Add tail back to system cell list
00201          system().pairPotential().addAtom(*tailPtr);
00202          #endif
00203    
00204          // Shift atom positions towards the head
00205          for (i=1; i < length - 1; ++i) {
00206             //system().moveAtom(*atomPtr, (atomPtr+sign)->position());
00207             atomPtr->position() = (atomPtr+sign)->position();
00208             #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00209             system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*atomPtr);
00210             #endif
00211             atomPtr += sign;
00212          }
00213    
00214          // Move head atom to new chosen position
00215          // system().moveAtom(*atomPtr, newPos);
00216          atomPtr->position() = newPos;
00217          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00218          system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*atomPtr);
00219          #endif
00220 
00221          // Increment the number of accepted moves.
00222          incrementNAccept();
00223 
00224          if (hasAutoCorr_)
00225          {
00226             // Store step direction in autocorrelator
00227             acceptedStepsAccumulators_[molPtr->id()].sample((double) sign);
00228          }
00229       } else {
00230 
00231          // Restore old position of tail
00232          tailPtr->position() = oldPos;
00233 
00234          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00235          // Add tail back to System cell list.
00236          system().pairPotential().addAtom(*tailPtr);
00237          #endif
00238    
00239       }
00240 
00241       return accept;
00242    
00243    }
00244 
00248    double CfbReptationMove::junctionFactor(Molecule* molPtr, int sign) 
00249    {
00250 
00251       double oldEnergy, newEnergy, factor;
00252       Atom* hAtomPtr; // Pointer to atom nearer head
00253       int hType;      // type id of atom nearer head
00254       int tType;      // type id of atom nearer tail
00255       int i;          // junction index
00256       int j;          // id of atom at below junction (lower)
00257 
00258 
00259       // Calculate factor by looping over junctions
00260       factor = 1.0;
00261       for (i = 0; i < nJunction_; ++i) {
00262          j = junctions_[i];
00263          if (sign == 1) {
00264             hAtomPtr = &(molPtr->atom(j+1));
00265             tType    = lTypes_[i];
00266          } else {
00267             hAtomPtr = &(molPtr->atom(j));
00268             tType    = uTypes_[i];
00269          }
00270 
00271          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00272          oldEnergy = system().pairPotential().atomEnergy(*hAtomPtr);
00273          #endif
00274 
00275          #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00276          oldEnergy += system().externalPotential().atomEnergy(*hAtomPtr);
00277          #endif
00278 
00279          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00280          hAtomPtr->setTypeId(tType);
00281          newEnergy = system().pairPotential().atomEnergy(*hAtomPtr);
00282          #endif
00283 
00284          #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00285          newEnergy += system().externalPotential().atomEnergy(*hAtomPtr);
00286          #endif
00287 
00288          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00289          factor *= boltzmann(newEnergy - oldEnergy);
00290          #endif
00291       }
00292 
00293       // Revert modified atom type Ids to original values
00294       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00295       for (i = 0; i < nJunction_; ++i) {
00296          j = junctions_[i];
00297          if (sign == 1) {
00298             hAtomPtr = &(molPtr->atom(j+1));
00299             hType    = uTypes_[i];
00300          } else {
00301             hAtomPtr = &(molPtr->atom(j));
00302             hType    = lTypes_[i];
00303          }
00304          hAtomPtr->setTypeId(hType);
00305       }
00306       return factor;
00307 
00308       #else //ifdef INTER_NOPAIR
00309       return 1.0;
00310       #endif
00311    }
00312 
00316    void CfbReptationMove::output()
00317    {
00318       if (hasAutoCorr_)
00319       {
00320          DArray< double > autoCorrAvg;
00321          autoCorrAvg.allocate(autoCorrCapacity_);
00322 
00323          // Calculate average autocorrelation function over all
00324          // accumulators
00325          for (int i = 0; i < autoCorrCapacity_; i++) {
00326             int nAvg = 0;
00327             autoCorrAvg[i] = 0;
00328             for (int j = 0; j < system().nMolecule(speciesId_); j++)
00329             {
00330                if (acceptedStepsAccumulators_[j].nSample() > i)
00331                {
00332                   nAvg++;
00333                   autoCorrAvg[i] += acceptedStepsAccumulators_[j].
00334                      autoCorrelation(i);
00335                }
00336             }
00337             autoCorrAvg[i] /= nAvg;
00338          }
00339 
00340          std::ofstream outputFile;
00341 
00342          // Write out average autocorrelation
00343          system().fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName_+".dat",
00344             outputFile);
00345 
00346          for (int i = 0; i <  autoCorrCapacity_; i++)
00347          {
00348             outputFile << Int(i);
00349             write<double>(outputFile, autoCorrAvg[i]);
00350             outputFile << std::endl;
00351          }
00352       
00353          outputFile.close();
00354 
00355          // Sum over autocorrelation (only positive time lags)
00356          // Count first element with a factor 1/2, due to symmetry
00357          double acSum = 0;
00358          acSum = 0.5*autoCorrAvg[0];
00359          for (int i = 1; i < autoCorrCapacity_; i++)
00360             acSum += autoCorrAvg[i];
00361 
00362          // write sum in .ave file
00363          system().fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName_+".ave",
00364             outputFile);
00365          outputFile << "autoCorrSum " << acSum << std::endl;
00366          outputFile.close();
00367       }
00368    }
